title: Lecture: The Impact of Provenance in the Market for Antiquities
hero_caption: Fragment of a Portrait Head of Antinous, 130/38. Ancient Roman.
short_description: Silvia Beltrametti, School of the Art Institute of Chicago, explores the profound impact that provenance records have on the sale of ancient artworks; how they affect the market value of individual objects; and how they can be employed to counter claims of illicit trade.
description:
Silvia Beltrametti, School of the Art Institute of Chicago, explores the profound impact that provenance records have on the sale of ancient artworks; how they affect the market value of individual objects; and how they can be employed to counter claims of illicit trade. 

Presented by the Classical Art Society

For more information, call (312) 443-3697 or email CAS@artic.edu.
